items.title: Trump privately pushed top state lawmakers to redistrict
items.description: Indiana Republicans remain split, but Trump and Vance directly appealed to state leaders at the White House as part of redistricting fight.

items.title: Democrats win special Iowa state Senate race, boosting optimism nationally
items.description: An upset victory by Catelin Drey flips a seat formerly held by a Republican in the conservative-leaning district that Trump easily won in 2024.
